name: Blasting Chances GMTK 22
description: This is what I made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. This is a shooter game where whether you succeed or fail is based off of a dice roll at the beginning of each round. There are rerolls for players with lower skill levels. This game was made in 48 hours filled with caffeine, tears, and an embarrassing amount of Brackeys. Enjoy
